description:
The rice seeds which an old man had been traveling with for half a year to bring back to his village are stolen from him. The seeds are returned and the old man is escorted back to his village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die tödliche Faust anhaltenden Bedauerns! Die Zukunft wird in der kargen Wüste gesichtet!
Hissatsu Zankaiken!! Fumou no Kouya ni Ashita o Mita!!
The Fist of Lingering Regret and Certain Death!! The Future Is Sighted in the Barren Wasteland!!
必殺残悔拳!! 不毛の荒野に明日をみた!!
